pages.about-us: About PureClean - Professional Home Cleaning Services and Commitment PureClean HOME ABOUT US Services Contact Cleaning Solutions for Your Home Ensure the cleanliness of your home with our specialized cleaning services designed for every need. From regular upkeep to intensive deep cleans, we provide tailored solutions to keep your space immaculate and fresh. VIEW SERVICES Deep Cleaning Services for Every Home In a busy world, maintaining a spotless home can be challenging. PureClean offers comprehensive deep cleaning solutions tailored specifically for your unique needs. With a wide range of services available, we provide specialized packages to ensure that every corner of your home is thoroughly cleaned and refreshed. VIEW SERVICES Specialty Cleaning Services for Every Need PureClean offers robust cleaning solutions tailored specifically for unique and challenging cleaning needs. Our service packages are designed to provide comprehensive care, drawing from our expertise in delivering exceptional results. VIEW SERVICES Make the Right Decision for Your Home Cleanliness. With years of experience in the cleaning industry, PureClean offers unparalleled expertise in maintaining spotless homes and offices. Our services are tailored to meet the unique needs of our customers. We pride ourselves on our reliable and efficient cleaning services, ensuring that our customers enjoy a pristine environment every time. Trust PureClean for all your cleaning needs. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Your Data Privacy with PureClean's Home Cleaning Services PureClean HOME ABOUT US Services Contact Privacy Policy PureClean is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information. Information We Collect We may collect the following information from you: Contact information: Name, email address, phone number Billing information: Payment details (if applicable) Information you provide when requesting a quote or booking a service Information collected through cookies and other tracking technologies (see our Cookie Policy below) How We Use Your Information We may use your information for the following purposes: To process your requests and bookings To provide you with customer service To send you marketing communications (with your consent) To improve our website and services Sharing Your Information We will not share your personal information with third parties except in the following cases: With service providers who help us operate our business (e.g., payment processors, marketing agencies) As required by law or to comply with legal process To protect the rights and safety of PureClean, our employees, and others We will always obtain your consent before sharing your information for marketing purposes. Data Security PureClean takes reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Your Choices You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. PureClean website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
